body: Sweet art as always. But again the rest of his works are way too similar plot wise. It’s getting very dull
someone get this man to make a manga with sum real story and good characters cuz the art is something else. if this man were to draw a fight scene it would blow my mind. ( didn't blow a load tho)
These artists force you to like ntr.

Well, I think Ken-1, when he said "original", meant works that are not "derivative", here in the US and English speaking countries we know them as parodies, certainly not talking about "typical" shit nor "run-of-the-mill" stuff. So for us, especially those NTR fans and veteran fellas, we see it differently, we want ORIGINAL stories, something unique or innovative to make them stand out. Anyway, I'm not gonna discuss that (TL;DR) but here is my review summary: NTRashy story but nice art, AGAIN... alright, overall, it's still good shit. PEACE
This type of story just never dies is it.. Did someone do this in real life? I bet they failed miserably

The beta manlet could never progress past handjobs so it's natural she fell for an Alpha male who came and showed her true pleasure and sex. As usual the cucks in comments who have similar experience as NTR protagonist seethe in the comments 🤣🤣

Then she has sex with her boyfriend once and says she’s pregnant with his baby and they both get kicked out of school..lol On a side note his dad gets suspicious and gets a paternity test and she gets found out. He promises not to tell anybody if she becomes his cum dump..lol
Anyone else chuckled when they read the artist afterword and they said "I'd like to put out lots more 'ORIGINAL' material from here on out."?
Just Bang Bang Bang and psshh. Really, the plot is braindead anyway

Personally this shit is straight garbage and part 2 it just the same shit... repeat bullshit. With a bitch that a bitch and of course the Mc pathetic boyfriend and his bitch ass friend that needs his ass kick.
The things NTR fans wont admit, is that the dialogue in NTR is material for cringe self inserters, to make them think that they are "chads" for reading it
